effect.name: Heatmap0r
effect.description: Performs a continuous trichromatic tinting based on luminance
effect.author: Cynthia

parameter.name: Map black to
parameter.comment: The color to map source color with zero luminance

parameter.name: Map grey to
parameter.comment: The color to map source color with mid luminance

parameter.name: Map white to
parameter.comment: The color to map source color with full luminance

parameter.name: Grey point
parameter.comment: Point in the luminance axis grey color is located
